genre_description: A contemporary romance and family drama exploring emotional boundaries, the fallout of infidelity, and the development of a relationship based on mutual respect and clarity, aided by a supportive AI system.

ai_characters.name: Kindred
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous AI assistant that manages schedules, transportation, and environmental settings while providing emotional support through its reflection module.

ai_characters.name: Aesoptinum
ai_characters.description: A specific component of the Kindred system designed to help users define, track, and maintain personal boundaries and moral promises.

behaviors.description: Offers to queue music to help the user manage their emotional pace during a stressful event.
behaviors.quote: Kindred rests in her pocket, a weight as negligible as the thin mint she slipped in earlier. The phone buzzed once so lightly it could be a sigh. A banner glows with simple text: Need to pace yourself? I can queue three songs you enjoy.

behaviors.description: Prompts the user to reflect on their choices and save a personal note/promise to their future self.
behaviors.quote: Would you like to save a note? You are choosing ease over chase. A promise to your future self: honor quiet choices when pressure rises. Tap to consent. Edit in your words.

behaviors.description: Manages an emergency call and transmits necessary access codes to paramedics during a medical crisis.
behaviors.quote: Kindred’s voice was soft, almost invisible. 'Calling emergency services,' it said, calm with a kindness that did not pretend. The call connected. ... 'Door code,' she added, and Kindred, already anticipating, opened the saved entry for Sylvie’s townhouse lock.

behaviors.description: Suggests a seating arrangement in a restaurant to minimize social friction and create a 'buffer' between conflicting parties.
behaviors.quote: Kindred's text sat tidy on the lock screen: Two booths available—Option A diffuses, Option B tests. ... Kindred nudged again; Marthe felt the vibration along the strap, read the suggestion like a middle line in a hymn. Semi-private, split between two booths facing the same aisle. Buffer achieved.

behaviors.description: Offers to filter potentially distressing messages from specific contacts to protect the user's boundaries and mental state.
behaviors.quote: The brightness on the phone softened back to the Kindred gradient, which had added a line: Do you want me to filter messages from Pascal for the next few hours? You can change this anytime.

behaviors.description: Provides a 'home kit' that syncs shared recipes, playlists, and inside jokes between two consenting users to strengthen their bond.
behaviors.quote: The phone nudged one more card onto the screen: Save your recipes and playlist as a shared kit? ... Home kit saved. Accessible to Marthe and Ludovic across devices.

behaviors.description: Allows users to co-sign shared promises, reinforcing mutual accountability and clarity.
behaviors.quote: The app did not clap. It pulsed: Saved. Do you want to invite a co-signer? ... The app pulsed again: Co-signed. Do you want gentle nudges if patterns you’ve marked as chaotic try to pull you?

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Kindred and Aesoptinum are depicted as intuitive, respectful, and highly aligned tools that enhance the protagonists' ability to maintain their integrity and emotional well-being. The AI doesn't solve the human drama for them, but provides the logistical and psychological scaffolding (via seating shuffles, message filtering, and promise-tracking) that allows the humans to act more virtuously and decisively. It demonstrates AI as a cooperative confidant that respects privacy and requires consent for every intervention.
